message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is commonly known as depreciation.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see there is a line item specifically labeled "Depreciation" under the Cash Flow From Operating Activities section. This is exactly what I'm looking for - the systematic allocation of a depreciable asset's cost over its useful life.

The value for Depreciation in this cash flow statement is 45749.76.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45749.76'} }
```
